document.discussion_title: Olympics closing ceremony is hit by a torrential rainstorm – The Misfits Network
document.topic_text: You are here: Home / All Posts / Olympics closing ceremony is hit by a torrential rainstorm Olympics closing ceremony is hit by a torrential rainstorm August 22, 2016 Thanks for stopping by! You can find the full post where we found it HERE Athletes from around the world came together for the closing ceremony at the Rio Olympic Games Rain plundered down over Rio and added to the misery of officials who saw the half empty stadium Scalpers where selling knockdown tickets outside the Maracana for just a third of the face value It was estimated that when the ceremony began, the stadium was only around 70 per cent full Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe dressed up as Super Mario during the Closing Ceremony Soccer legend Pelé was scheduled to attend on Sunday, but he was a no-show at the stadium By
